original_text: And he took him by the right hand and raised him up, and immediately his feet and ankles were made strong.
korean_text: 오른손을 잡아 일으키니 발과 발목이 곧 힘을 얻고

sentences.original_text: And he took him by the right hand
and immediately his feet and ankles were made strong.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 즉시 그의 발과 발목이 튼튼하게 되었습니다.
